alert.note: Alert for Animas River Basin; San Juan River Basin (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued October 23 at 8:57AM MDT until October 23 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MDT TODAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. * WHERE...Animas River Basin and San Juan River Basin. * WHEN...Until noon MDT today. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects. People, especially those with respiratory illnesses, heart disease, the elderly, and children are recommended to stay indoors and avoid prolonged outdoor exercise or heavy exertion due to wind-blown dust.

area.areaDesc: Animas River Basin; San Juan River Basin
